name: Super Catcher
description:
Information

A game about collecting different types of points. Some of them increase the score, and some decrease them.

Over time, there are more and more points. If the score is less than zero, then you lose. Collect only the points you need. Good luck

Controls

Keyboard - A & D or Left & Right arrow keys

Touchscreen - Left & Right parts of the screen

If you like the game, please leave a comment or donate money.
